item.title: A Hybrid Jupyter Notebook Workflow
item.description: I use jupyter notebooks quite a bit and have developed a workflow that allows me to leverage python modules in order to give the notebook more structure. This talk does a great job describing some problems and pain points I have also encountered when working in a notebook environment. â€ƒMost times if I work exclusively in a notebook I tend to not be very smart with the program architecture due to the ability to execute cells in an arbitrary order that I forget about.
